name: My OCD (Pre-COVID Edition)
description:
Project for Sculpture IV.

Controls:

Arrow Keys - Move

Z- Interact

X- Jump 

Quick Guide:

  1. Walk into the spaceship and survive the waves of bacteria.
  2. Walk into the kitchen; you will then receive a message from “Mom”.
  3. Walk out of the house and walk to the right until you run into joggers.
  4. Continue walking down the street; avoid the joggers as you go.
  5. You will see a grocery store, walk into it.
  6. The second isle from the right will teleport you to a mini-game. Avoid the bacteria and collect the egg, toast, and milk.
  7. You will be teleported outside of the store, walk on the path that goes to the park (located behind store).
  8. Walk through the park, eventually the player will mention not only walking on the left side of the path (Follow the instructions or the player will continually walk back).
  9. Game will end after completing previous step, player will be teleported to credits screen.

 

Thank you for playing!
